EmailTemplate.name: Fundraiser Follow-up
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for giving YETI the opportunity for involvement in your recent fundraising event. We wanted to follow up with your regarding your experience using YETI for the (GROUP NAME)
We would appreciate any feedback you can give us and if you have a few minutes, please answer the questions below.
We are striving to meet your expectations for fundraiser involvement and would like to know how we are doing in an effort to better serve our customers as we continue to grow.
How did you choose to use the cooler? (Raffle, Silent Auction, Live auction, etc.)
Was the use of the cooler(s) successful in raising funds for your cause?
Would you consider the purchase of a YETI Cooler(s) in the future for other fundraising efforts?
What was the approximate attendance at the event?
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
